summary: When the Earth is threatened by a burning Van Allen Radiation Belt, U.S. Navy Admiral Harriman Nelson plans to shoot a nuclear missile at the Belt, using his experimental atomic submarine, the Seaview.
cast: Walter Pidgeon|Joan Fontaine|Barbara Eden|Peter Lorre|Robert Sterling|Michael Ansara|Frankie Avalon|Regis Toomey|John Litel|Howard McNear|Henry Daniell|Skip Ward|Mark Slade|Charles Tannen|Del Monroe|Tony Monaco|Michael Ford|Robert Easton|Jonathan Gilmore|Richard Adams|Al Bain|Art Baker|Benjie Bancroft|Harry Baum|Robert Buckingham|Michael Cirillo|Charles Dierkop|George Diestel|John Giovanni|Larry Gray|Bhupesh Guha|William Herrin|Kendrick Huxham|Esther Ying Lee|Robert Locke Lorraine|David McLean|Jimmy Murphy|George Nardelli|Paul Power|Paul Ravel|Scott Seaton|Leslie Sketchley|Ray Spiker|Robert Strong|Hal Taggart
title: Viaje al fondo del mar
